page.shortlink: grid properties advanced message subscriptions property
page.description: Define what message types to receive from the web-socket server. Requires Web-socket server to be enabled.
page.discussion: Specify if you want to subscribe to all messages, or to a subset of the message 'types' broadcast by the web-socket server. If you leave this blank then you will be subscribed to all web-socket messages. Enter a comma delimited list of message types that you want to subscribe to.
